project-name.description: The name of the project. usually equal to the repo anme on github and the .sln file to build. If not, customize manually.

git-owner.description: The name of the organization or github user that owns the github repo

target-framework.description: The target framework of the build project (net6.0 or net7.0). default is net6.0

individuaPackageVersions.description: If set, the build project will support individual package versions and release notes per project.
